name: Keloid Formation Post-Ear Piercing
chief_complaint: I have a large, itchy bump growing where I got my ear pierced 6 months ago
physical_findings: firm, rubbery nodule extending beyond original wound
prognosis: Good with treatment but high recurrence risk (50-80%) without adjuvant therapy
description: Benign fibrous growth extending beyond original wound boundaries due to abnormal collagen deposition during healing. Common after trauma in predisposed individuals.
